TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PersonalizationProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class PersonalizationProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: Implements the basic functionality for a personalization provider.

span.span: Implements the basic functionality for a personalization provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是抽象的基底類別定義的個人化提供者所需的功能。This is the abstract base class that defines the required functionality of a personalization provider. 個人化提供者同時載入和儲存個人化資料代表執行個體。A personalization provider both loads and stores personalization data on behalf of a instance. 基底類別定義的標準行為的方法。只有在專門處理基礎的資料存放區的方法標記為抽象。The base class defines standard behavior for a number of methods; only those methods that specifically deal with the underlying data store are marked abstract. 這可讓開發人員撰寫自訂的提供者，以便與特定資料存放區互動，而不必重新實作所使用的標準功能類別。This allows a developer to write a custom provider to interact with a specific data store, without needing to re-implement standard functionality used by the class.

span.para: 您可以從衍生並提供僅定義於此類別的抽象方法的實作。抽象方法處理，特別是儲存及載入資料至實體資料存放區與資料存放區管理。自訂提供者必須能夠管理個人化資訊的方式，可區別資料資料。此外，提供者必須分割個人化資料，由頁面以及應用程式。實作會緊密結合的實作因為某些個人化提供者方法傳回的執行個體-衍生的類別。為了簡化開發自訂提供者，基底類別包含的預設實作的個人化的邏輯和序列化/還原序列化邏輯，可直接以類別。如此一來，撰寫僅供目的使用不同的資料存放區的自訂提供者只需要下列的抽象方法的實作:- -此方法必須要能夠計算中的個人化資料列數目提供的查詢參數的資料庫。 - -指定的路徑和使用者名稱，這個方法會載入兩個二進位大型物件 (Blob) 資料庫中： 一個 BLOB 的共用的資料，一個用於使用者資料。如果您提供的使用者名稱和路徑，則您不需要控制項來存取可提供使用者名稱/路徑資訊的頁面資訊。 - -指定的路徑和使用者名稱，這個方法會刪除資料庫中對應資料列。如果您提供的使用者名稱和路徑，則您不需要控制項來存取可提供使用者名稱/路徑資訊的頁面資訊。 - -指定的路徑和使用者名稱，這個方法會儲存所提供的 BLOB 到資料庫。如果您提供的使用者名稱和路徑，則您不需要控制項來存取可提供使用者名稱/路徑資訊的頁面資訊。在所有這些方法中，如果只有提供路徑，則表示要對網頁共用個人化資料。如果使用者名稱和路徑傳遞至方法時，該頁面的使用者個人化資料應該作用時。如果是，應該永遠載入指定路徑的共用的資料，並且選擇性地使用者個人化路徑應該也將資料載入如果使用者名稱不是。其他所有抽象方法只有在系統管理的應用程式會提供，而不會使用 Web 組件基礎結構在執行階段。如需的個人化提供者實作的範例，請參閱類別。

You can derive from and provide implementations for only the abstract methods defined in this class. The abstract methods deal specifically with saving and loading data to a physical data store, and with data store administration. A custom provider must be capable of manipulating personalization information in a manner that distinguishes data from data. Furthermore, a provider must segment personalization data by page as well as by application. Implementations of are tightly coupled to implementations of because some personalization provider methods return instances of -derived classes. To ease development of custom providers, the base class includes a default implementation of the personalization logic and serialization/deserialization logic that is used directly by the class. As a result, authoring a custom provider solely for the purpose of working with a different data store only requires implementation of the following abstract methods: - - This method needs to be able to count the number of rows of personalization data in the database for the supplied query parameters. - - Given the path and user name, this method loads two binary large objects (BLOBs) from the database: one BLOB for shared data and one for user data. If you supply the user name and path, then you do not need the control to access the page information that can provide the user name/path information. - - Given the path and user name, this method deletes the corresponding row in the database. If you supply the user name and path, then you do not need the control to access the page information that can provide the user name/path information. - - Given the path and user name, this method saves the supplied BLOB to the database. If you supply the user name and path, then you do not need the control to access the page information that can provide the user name/path information. In all of these methods, if only a path is supplied, that indicates the shared personalization data for the page is being operated upon. If both a path and a username are passed to a method, then the user personalization data for the page should be acted upon. In the case of , the shared data for the specified path should always be loaded, and optionally the user personalization data for the path should also be loaded if the username is not . All other abstract methods are intended for use only in administrative applications and are not used by the Web Parts infrastructure at run time. For an example of an implementation of a personalization provider, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為這是抽象類別的建構函式，您必須覆寫這個方法，以建立繼承自這個類別的執行個體。Because this is a constructor for an abstract class, you must override this method to create an instance of a class that inherits from this class.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the name of the application configured for the provider.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the name of the application configured for the provider.

value.span: 個人化提供者設定的應用程式。

span.span: The application configured for the personalization provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果應用程式名稱未指定在組態檔中使用[進行個人化的 web 組件 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的提供者項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51363b49-eafa-4b9c-b9d0-80086b385195)屬性的值屬性使用。If an application name is not specified in the configuration file using the [providers Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51363b49-eafa-4b9c-b9d0-80086b385195) attribute, the value of the property is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因為由提供服務的所有要求會都使用預設的個人化提供者執行個體的單一物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，每個嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single, default personalization provider instance is used for all the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently, each attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是安全執行緒的多個寫入，以及變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建議您避免程式碼可讓使用者設定屬性除非所需。It is recommended that you avoid code allowing users to set the property unless required. 設定屬性可能是必要項，例如，在系統管理的應用程式管理多個應用程式的個人化資料。Setting the property might be required, for example, in an administrative application that manages personalization data for multiple applications.

summary.span: Returns a list of objects that represent the set of known capabilities used by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前，這個方法會傳回包含兩個功能的清單：和。Currently, this method returns a list containing two capabilities: and . 這些是可以在中定義的預設功能[個人化的 web 組件 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的授權項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434)內的項目[webParts (ASP.NET 的個人化項目設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d77da55-73ce-46ce-97cf-7d2abcaada09)元素[web 組件元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90af5acc-5a80-4b39-bba7-74afd06b167c)組態區段。These are the default capabilities that can be defined in the [authorization Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434) element within the [personalization Element for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d77da55-73ce-46ce-97cf-7d2abcaada09) element of the[webParts Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90af5acc-5a80-4b39-bba7-74afd06b167c) configuration section. 如果您選擇實作自訂的個人化基礎結構，您可以覆寫這個方法，並定義您自己的授權相關的使用者功能集。If you choose to implement a custom personalization infrastructure, you can override this method and define your own set of authorization-related user capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷是否應為目前範圍或，參考控制項及個人化狀態已經載入從稍早在個人化生命週期中的資訊。This method determines whether the current scope should be or , given a reference to a control and the personalization state information that has already been loaded from earlier in the personalization life cycle. 這項資訊由後續的個人化相關工作的執行個體。This information is used by a instance for subsequent personalization-related tasks. 下列規則可用來判斷個人化範圍：The following rules are used to determine personalization scope: - 範圍假設一開始為。Scope is assumed initially to be . - 如果目前正在執行的使用者帳戶未通過驗證，範圍會設定為。If the currently executing user account is not authenticated, the scope is set to . - 如果目前正在執行的使用者帳戶進行驗證時，會依照優先順序進行其他處理：If the currently executing user account is authenticated, additional processing occurs in order of precedence: - 如果分頁是在回傳模式下，頁面要求就會包含來自先前呈現頁面的範圍資訊。If the page is in postback mode, the page request contains scope information from a previous rendering of the page. 如果該範圍的資訊指出中使用的範圍，則範圍評估為。If that scope information indicates that scope was used, then the scope evaluates to . - 如果目前正在執行的頁面已從另一頁轉移到它的控制項 (例如，如果將控制項原因呼叫方法; 請注意，跨網頁公佈不至於發生此特定的核取)，如果先前執行網頁有執行個體，範圍設定的值為`Personalization.Scope`屬性從先前執行個體。If the currently executing page had control transferred to it from another page (for example, if the transfer of control occurred due to calling the method; note that this specific check does not occur for cross-page posting), and if the previously executing page had a instance, the scope is set to the value of the `Personalization.Scope` property from the previous instance. - 如果不符合上述準則，則範圍評估為值的屬性目前控制項。If the previous criteria are not met, then the scope evaluates to the value of the property for the current control. 在進行先前的評估之後，而且如果範圍評估為範圍，請進行下列處理：After the previous evaluations have been made, and if the scope evaluates to scope, the following processing occurs: - 如果目前正在執行的使用者帳戶具有功能，範圍仍然設為。If the currently executing user account has the capability, the scope remains set to . - 如果目前正在執行的使用者帳戶並沒有功能，則範圍會重設為。If the currently executing user account does not have the capability, then the scope is reset to . - 如果所有先前的範圍內評估結果為，此結果會儲存為目前正在執行的頁面上的隱藏欄位。If the result of all previous scope evaluations is , this result is stored as a hidden field on the currently executing page. 這是讓網頁可以重新執行範圍內評估，在後續回傳期間的機制。This is the mechanism whereby a page can replay the scope evaluation during subsequent postbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作會使用中的資訊[個人化的 web 組件 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的授權項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434)內的項目[個人化項目為web 組件 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d77da55-73ce-46ce-97cf-7d2abcaada09)元素[web 組件元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90af5acc-5a80-4b39-bba7-74afd06b167c)組態區段中的 Machine.config 或 Web.config 檔案，以判斷使用者的授權功能。The default implementation of this method consumes the information in the [authorization Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434) element within the [personalization Element for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d77da55-73ce-46ce-97cf-7d2abcaada09) element of the[webParts Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90af5acc-5a80-4b39-bba7-74afd06b167c) configuration section in the Machine.config or Web.config file to determine a user's authorized capabilities. 字典中的功能將會屬於所傳回物件方法，目前包括功能和功能。The capabilities in the dictionary will be members of the object returned by the method, which currently include the capability and the capability.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是抽象的定義，管理方法來查詢個人化資料。This method is the abstract definition of an administrative method for querying personalization data. 衍生的實作應該遵循的邏輯如下所述。Derived implementations should follow the logic described below. 傳回的項目組由限制`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數，其中`pageSize`設定要傳回的記錄數目和`pageIndex`設定要傳回的記錄。The set of returned items is constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters, where `pageSize` sets the number of records to return and `pageIndex` sets which records to return. 比方說，`pageIndex`為 0 和`pageSize`25 個會傳回前 25 個相符項目，雖然`pageIndex`的 1 和`pageSize`25 個會傳回出現 26-50。For example, a `pageIndex` of 0 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return the first 25 occurrences, while a `pageIndex` of 1 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return occurrences 26-50. 如果您想要擷取所有可用的記錄，設定`pageIndex`設為 0 和`pageSize`至。If you want to retrieve all available records, set `pageIndex` to 0 and `pageSize` to . -字母順序傳回衍生的物件，然後依照的組合其和屬性值，同時以遞增順序。The -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order and sorted by a combination of their and property values, both in ascending order. 這個方法會將查詢萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 目前取決於每個提供者處理等星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元的方式支援萬用字元。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，對於 SQL 標準的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑上以出現在開頭、 結尾或中間的搜尋字串文字中的萬用字元屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭為"~/vdir"，所有路徑屬性會設定為"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同樣地，萬用字元搜尋部分的使用者名稱可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有啟動的使用者名稱與"John"，參數會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". 適用於下列查詢條件約束：The following query constraints apply: - 如果只有`scope`提供，並`query`是`null`或上的所有屬性`query`傳回`null`或預設值，則比對所指定的所有記錄`scope`傳回參數。If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are returned. - 如果屬性不是`null`，傳回的記錄也會篩選根據的路徑符合值。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on paths that match the value. - 如果屬性不是`null`，傳回的記錄也會篩選根據的使用者名稱符合屬性值。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on user names that match the property value. - 如果屬性不等於，則傳回的記錄也會篩選傳回非作用中使用者相關聯的記錄。If the property is not equal to , then the returned records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users. 比較包含記錄其中屬性小於或等於屬性。The comparison includes records where the property is less than or equal to the property. 請注意，這個方法不會驗證查詢參數的組合。Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters. 例如，程式碼可以要求一組共用的範圍中的特定使用者名稱與相關聯的個人化狀態記錄。For example, code can request a set of personalization state records associated with a specific user name in the shared scope. 因為使用者名稱不是共用的資訊與相關聯，則傳回的集合會是空白。Because user names are not associated with shared information, the returned collection would be empty. 有可能會傳回空集合的參數組合包括：Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-empty collection include: - 結合的範圍屬性。 scope in combination with the property. - 範圍中的任何或所有的值組合， ，和屬性。 scope in combination with the values for any or all of the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是抽象的定義，管理方法來擷取的個人化的資料計數。This method is the abstract definition of an administrative method for retrieving counts of personalization data. 衍生的實作應該遵循的邏輯如下所述。Derived implementations should follow the logic described below. 這個方法會將查詢萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 目前取決於每個提供者處理等星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元的方式支援萬用字元。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，對於 SQL 標準的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑上以出現在開頭、 結尾或中間的搜尋字串文字中的萬用字元屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭為"~/vdir"，所有路徑屬性會設定為"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同樣地，萬用字元搜尋部分的使用者名稱可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有啟動的使用者名稱與"John"，參數會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". 適用於下列查詢條件約束：The following query constraints apply: - 如果只有`scope`提供，並`query`是`null`或上的所有屬性`query`傳回`null`或預設值，則比對所指定的所有記錄`scope`計算參數。If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are counted. - 如果屬性不是`null`，計數的記錄也會篩選根據的路徑符合值。If the property is not `null`, the counted records are also filtered based on paths that match the value. - 如果屬性不是`null`，計數的記錄也會篩選根據的使用者名稱符合屬性值。If the property is not `null`, the counted records are also filtered based on user names that match the property value. - 如果屬性不等於，然後計算的記錄也會篩選傳回非作用中使用者相關聯的記錄。If the property is not equal to , then the counted records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users. 比較包含記錄其中屬性小於或等於屬性。The comparison includes records where the property is less than or equal to the property. 請注意，這個方法不會驗證查詢參數的組合。Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters. 例如，程式碼可以要求在共用範圍特定的使用者名稱與相關聯的個人化狀態記錄的計數。For example, code can request a count of personalization state records associated with a specific user name in the shared scope. 因為使用者名稱不是共用的資訊與相關聯，則傳回的計數會是零。Because user names are not associated with shared information, the returned count would be zero. 有可能會傳回非零計數的參數組合包括：Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-zero count include: - 結合的範圍屬性。 scope in combination with the property. - 範圍中的任何或所有的值組合， ，和屬性。 scope in combination with the values for any or all of the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自和實作這個方法應該使用`webPartManager`， `path`，和`username`參數做為擷取索引鍵。Classes that derive from and implement this method should use the `webPartManager`, `path`, and `username` parameters as retrieval keys. 不論資料的方式儲存在資料存放區 （某些資料存放區可能會執行某種類型的智慧型存放裝置），必須傳回資料的個人化成為組封裝的兩個陣列中的位元組。Regardless of how the data is stored in the data store (some data stores might perform some type of intelligent storage), the personalization data must be returned as a packed set of bytes in two arrays. 傳回的資料必須符合下列規則：The returned data must conform to the following rules: - 針對資料範圍必須一律以傳回`sharedDataBlob`參數。The data for the scope must always be returned in the `sharedDataBlob` parameter. - 根據索引鍵值，中傳回資料`userDataBlob`參數。Depending on the key values, data is returned in the `userDataBlob` parameter. 非`null`值`userName`參數會指示也擷取資料。A non-`null` value for the `userName` parameter indicates that data should also be retrieved. 個人化提供者衍生自和實作這個方法可以最佳化其資料存放區之間的互動擷取一次反覆中的所有個人化資料擷取相對於和中兩個資料分隔往返。A personalization provider that derives from and implements this method can optimize interactions with its data store by retrieving all personalization data in one round trip, as opposed to retrieving and data in two separate round trips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是所使用的主要進入點載入個人化資料的類別。This method is the main entry point used by the class to load personalization data. 預設實作會從基礎資料存放區載入的未經處理資料 （功能在衍生的提供者中實作），然後將轉換的未經處理資料到執行個體。The default implementation loads the raw data from the underlying data store (functionality is implemented in derived providers) and then converts the raw data into a instance. 如果`ignoreCurrentUser`參數是`true`，沒有使用者名稱傳遞至方法。If the `ignoreCurrentUser` parameter is `true`, no user name is passed to the method. 個人化提供者可以選擇將解譯成表示該唯一的個人化狀態與範圍應該從基礎資料存放區中擷取。A personalization provider can choose to interpret this as meaning that only personalization state with a scope should be retrieved from the underlying data store. 當方法正在執行時，它會呼叫方法，而且有三種類型的還原序列化錯誤時所要載入的狀態可能會發生。When the method is executing, it calls the method, and there are three types of deserialization errors that can occur as the state is being loaded. 當這些特定的錯誤發生時，會擲回任何例外狀況，而且健全狀況監視功能會改為記錄的錯誤事件 (健全狀況監視，以及存取它所建立的記錄檔的資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 健康監視概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e003f224-70fe-4cd8-a71a-2dc81e2d7e4c)).When these specific errors occur, no exception is thrown, and the error events are logged instead by the Health Monitoring feature (for information on health monitoring and accessing the logs created by it, see [ASP.NET Health Monitoring Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e003f224-70fe-4cd8-a71a-2dc81e2d7e4c)). 下列的三種案例會讓還原序列化錯誤事件寫入記錄檔：The following three scenarios cause deserialization error events to be written to the log: - 還原序列化會使用字串的屬性類型的失敗的嘗試。A failed attempt to deserialize a property type that uses a string . - 若要還原序列化使用二進位序列化的屬性型別嘗試失敗。A failed attempt to deserialize a property type that uses binary serialization. - 若要還原序列化的屬性類型，因為無法建立類型的執行個體嘗試失敗。A failed attempt to deserialize a property type because an instance of the type cannot be created.

The page associated with is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自和實作這個方法應該使用`webPartManager`， `path`，和`userName`參數做為儲存體金鑰。Classes that derive from and implement this method should use the `webPartManager`, `path`, and `userName` parameters as storage keys. 衍生的實作必須修改資料存放區，以便有效地刪除個人化資料提供的儲存金鑰。Derived implementations must modify the data store so that personalization data for supplied storage keys is effectively deleted. 這是由衍生的實作，決定如何在實際完成這項作業。It is up to the derived implementations as to how they physically accomplish this. 衍生的個人化提供者必須能夠區分每個頁面為基礎的個人化資料。The derived personalization provider must be able to distinguish personalization data on a per-page basis. 此外，針對指定的頁面狀態，個人化提供者必須能夠區分和範圍資料。Furthermore, for a given page's state, the personalization provider must be able to distinguish between and scope data. 如果將非`null`提供使用者名稱，然後重設作業套用至範圍; 否則重設作業適用於範圍。If a non-`null` user name is provided, then the reset operation applies to the scope; otherwise, the reset operation applies to the scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是所使用的主要進入點重設個人化資料的類別。This method is the main entry point used by the class to reset personalization data. 預設實作會使用控制項來決定要重設資料的路徑和使用者名稱。The default implementation uses the control to determine the path and user name for the data to be reset. 然後預設實作會呼叫方法。The default implementation then calls the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是刪除個人化資料的管理方法的抽象定義。This method is the abstract definition of an administrative method for deleting personalization data. 衍生的實作應該遵循的邏輯如下所述。Derived implementations should follow the logic described below. 這個方法不支援任何萬用字元搜尋。No wildcard character searches are supported by this method. 如果個人化提供者會公開可感知交易的資料存放區，這個方法應該執行其作業為單一不可部分完成交易。If the personalization provider exposes data from a transaction-aware data store, this method should perform its operations as a single atomic transaction. 允許參數的下列組合：Only the following combinations of parameters are allowed: - `scope`參數設定，而所有其他參數會設定為`null`。The `scope` parameter is set, and all other parameters are set to `null`. 這個組合會刪除與所指定的個人化範圍相關聯的所有 Web 組件個人化資料`scope`。This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data associated with the personalization scope indicated by `scope`. - `scope`參數設定，而`paths`參數包含至少一個值。The `scope` parameter is set, and the `paths` parameter contains at least one value. 這個組合會刪除指定的路徑或路徑中所指定的個人化範圍的所有 Web 組件個人化資料`scope`。This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data for the specified path or paths in the personalization scope indicated by `scope`. - `scope`參數設定為、`paths`參數會設定且包含只有一個值，而`usernames`參數包含至少一個值。The `scope` parameter is set to , the `paths` parameter is set and contains only one value, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value. 這個組合會刪除所有的使用者個人化指定的路徑中包含的使用者與相關聯的 Web 組件資料`usernames`。This combination deletes all user personalization Web Parts data for the given path that is associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`. - `scope`參數設定為、`paths`參數設定為`null`，而`usernames`參數包含至少一個值。The `scope` parameter is set to , the `paths` parameter is set to `null`, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value. 這個組合會刪除所有的每位使用者個人化 Web 組件的資料，在與中所包含的使用者相關聯的所有路徑之間`usernames`。This combination deletes all per-user personalization Web Parts data, across all paths, associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`. 參數值的任何其他組合無效，而且將會擲回例外狀況。Any other combination of parameter values is invalid and will throw an exception. 具體而言，不允許下列兩種組合：Specifically, the following two combinations are not allowed: - `usernames`參數不能提供何時`scope`設。The `usernames` parameter cannot be provided when `scope` is set to . - `paths`參數不能包含多個項目時`usernames`參數不是`null`。The `paths` parameter cannot contain more than one entry when the `usernames` parameter is not `null`. 任何`paths`和`usernames`各自的陣列中所包含的參數值必須符合下列的驗證規則。Any `paths` and `usernames` parameter values contained within the respective arrays must meet the following validation rules. 如果失敗的任何驗證規則的參數陣列中，任何成員擲回例外狀況。If any validation rules fail for any member of the parameter arrays, an exception is thrown. 驗證規則如下：The validation rules are: - `null` 不允許值。`null` values are not allowed. - 空字串 ("") 不允許。An empty string ("") is not allowed. 參數應該修剪之前執行的檢查，空字串。Parameters should be trimmed prior to performing an empty string check. - `usernames`參數不能包含逗號 （，）。The `usernames` parameter cannot contain commas (,). - 長度`paths`參數不能超過 256 個字元的 SQL 資料庫。The length of the `paths` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters for a SQL database. - 長度`usernames`參數不能超過 256 個字元的 SQL 資料庫。The length of the `usernames` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters for a SQL database.

returns.span: The number of rows deleted from the underlying data store.

span.span: The number of rows deleted from the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是刪除個人化資料的管理方法的抽象定義。This method is the abstract definition of an administrative method for deleting personalization data. 請注意，這個方法只會影響使用者個人化資料和不共用的資料。Note that this method affects only user personalization data, and not shared data. 衍生的實作應該遵循的邏輯如下所述：Derived implementations should follow the logic described below: - `path`參數不能包含萬用字元。The `path` parameter cannot contain wildcard characters. - 如果提供者會公開可感知交易的資料存放區，這個方法應該在單一不可部分完成交易中執行其作業。If the provider exposes data from a transaction-aware data store, this method should perform its operations in a single atomic transaction. - 如果`path`參數為非`null`，則只有每位使用者個人化資料錄與相關聯`path`將被刪除。If the `path` parameter is non-`null`, then only per-user personalization records associated with `path` will be deleted. - 只有每位使用者個人化資料錄會被視為非使用中所示的日期後的使用者相關聯`userInactiveSinceDate`參數將被刪除。Only per-user personalization records associated with users that are considered inactive since the date indicated in the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter will be deleted. 具體來說，記錄小於或等於會被刪除。Specifically, records where is less than or equal to are deleted. - 如果有提供這兩個參數，則會刪除比對兩個條件約束的記錄。If both parameters are provided, then records that match both constraints are deleted. - `path`參數可以是`null`。The `path` parameter can be `null`. - `path`參數不可為空字串。The `path` parameter cannot be an empty string. 它應該修剪之前執行這項檢查。It should be trimmed prior to performing this check. - 屬性不可以是`null`。The property cannot be `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是方法的將原始的個人化資料儲存至基礎資料存放區所使用的抽象定義。This method is the abstract definition of the method used for saving raw personalization data to the underlying data store. 在衍生的實作應該使用`webPartManager`， `path`，和`userName`參數做為儲存體金鑰。Derived implementations should use the `webPartManager`, `path`, and `userName` parameters as storage keys. 衍生的個人化提供者必須能夠區分每個頁面為基礎的個人化資料。The derived personalization provider must be able to distinguish personalization data on a per-page basis. 此外，針對指定的頁面狀態，提供者必須能夠區分和範圍。Furthermore, for a given page's state, the provider must be able to distinguish between and scope. 如果將非`null`提供使用者名稱，然後在`dataBlob`參數是在範圍; 否則`dataBlob`參數假設為範圍。If a non-`null` user name is provided, then the `dataBlob` parameter is in scope; otherwise, the `dataBlob` parameter is assumed to be in scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是所使用的主要進入點類別來儲存個人化資料。This method is the main entry point used by the class to save personalization data. 這個方法的預設實作會使用的內部實作的方法包個人化資料的位元組陣列。The default implementation of this method uses the methods of an internal implementation of to pack personalization data into a byte array. 如果此封裝的結果會建立空的位元組陣列 （因為沒有個人化資料造成屬性擷取），預設實作會呼叫方法。If the results of this packing create an empty byte array (because property extraction resulted in no personalization data), the default implementation calls the method. 否則，預設實作會呼叫方法。Otherwise, the default implementation calls the method.

span.span: is .

exception.span: The object being saved has a different type from the object that was returned by the method.

span.span: The object being saved has a different type from the object that was returned by the method.
